body:
- Add `+external-libfabric` variant to `intel-oneapi-mpi` & `intel-mpi` packages:

If `+external-libfabric` is set, a libfabric.so from the external `libfabric`
package is added to RUNPATH instead of Intel MPIs internal one.

- Align `intel-mpi` with `intel-oneapi-mpi` package behavior:

Intel MPI used to add its libfabric path to 'SPACK_COMPILER_EXTRA_RPATHS' and
therefore the RPATH of every dependent built with `intel-mpi`. Intel OneAPI MPI
added its libfabric path to the RUNPATH of libmpi.so.
title: Dev libfabric
